title: Sri Maa Janmotsav 2025
description: Grand celebration of Sri Sri Maa's birth anniversary with special satsangs, kirtan, prasad distribution, and continuous naam sankirtan. Devotees from around the world gather to celebrate this auspicious day.

title: Monthly Satsang - Varanasi
description: Regular monthly gathering for kirtan, meditation, and discourse on Maa's teachings. All devotees welcome. Followed by prasad.

title: Samadhi Day Observance
description: Commemorating the day Maa left her physical form. Day of silence, meditation, and remembrance of Maa's eternal presence.

title: Kirtan Evening with Swami Bhaskarananda
description: Special evening of devotional kirtan led by Swami Bhaskarananda. Experience the joy of singing divine names together.

title: Online Study Group - Words of Sri Anandamayi Ma
description: Weekly online study and discussion of Maa's teachings. Open to all sincere seekers worldwide. Join via Zoom.

title: Retreat at Almora Centre
description: 5-day spiritual retreat in the peaceful Himalayan setting. Includes meditation, satsang, silence periods, and karma yoga. Limited spots available.
